name: Magnifying Monocle

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Increases cast range and attack range for melee and ranged heroes.
notes: When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the cast range bonus and attack range bonus are increased by 30%
Player-based damage greater than 25 - regardless of alliance - puts the item on a fixed cooldown
Can be reset with cooldown reset sources
The player-based damage cooldown does not proc on self-damage sources
The player-based damage cooldown does not proc on HP Removal sources
The player-based damage cooldown does not proc on Roshan, despite the in-game tooltip

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
